long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Grow your business with Botsheart extension. 


Botsheart will help you with your outreach campaign on LinkedIn. You can find and approach leads much faster, save time and manage your conversion rates. 

- You can save templates of your campaigns to be used in the future
- You will have access to reports that will help you determine how effective your campaign is.
- Botsheart will suggest leads with the biggest potential for response 
- You can significantly decrease of time consumed for searching and approaching cold leads- thanks to Botsheart you can focus on the most important part of sales- personal contact, all other steps Botheart will do for you .

Disclaimer:
The 'Botsheart' browser extension is not endorsed or certified by LinkedIn. All LinkedIn(tm) logos and trademarks may displayed on this tool are property of LinkedIn only.
